page.title: 16WILTON ESTATE AND PARK
page.content: {WILTON ESTATE: In the estate there are mainly stone terraces. There are also some red brick and grit rendered semi detached houses which are now being restored. There is a primary and a middle school and also a shop which has boarded up windows and graffiti on the walls. { {WILTON PARK: In the park there is a lake with an island in it. At the side of the lake is a licensed restaurant. There is now a footpath where the railway line was. In the park the leisure facilities include a games pavilion, two bowling greens, six tennis courts and an eighteen hole putting green. There is some graffiti on the pathway saying 'SON OF OI!' {G.L.FLEMING & C.B.PICKLES BATLEY G.S.
